name: Jyotsna
greetingText: I'm too pussy to say sorry normally and accept that I'm a horrible person for aise ignoring you because I was unable to face you cause I was unable to face myself.
wishText: You're the best friend I always dreamt of having and I WILL NOT ever be able to forgive myself genuinely if I lose you over some shit for which only I am to blame, pls I'm so sorry I love you bohot hi zyada, you're literally family. I'm so sorry to have pulled such bs I wish I could come to delhi and give u flowers irl and apologise properly and then meri pittayi karke emotionally thoda harass karke sab kuch firse normal ho jaaye :(. I'll try to be better tho ab and OH FS NEVER LIE ABOUT ANYTHING TO U CAUSE THAT IS LITERALLY SO DUMB IM SO SORRY AGAIN PLS :(
